name: Mahjong Premium
description:
Classic game of Mahjong Solitaire with lively graphics, automatic zoom, high resolution tiles designed for tablets and larger phones. This version is adfree.

Features:
- 7 tilesets including Classic, Western and Halloween,
- More than 35 different patterns,
- 3 randomely generated patterns for infinite play (more soon),
- Lovely music
- Pinch to zoom and scrolling with two fingers for smaller screens (requires multitouch),
- 8 backgrounds,
- Automatic Zoom,
- Undo,
- Reshuffle,
- Time,
- Score,
- Autosave,
- Always solvable.

Please report any problems to our developer e-mail. We'll fix all problems ASAP.
